id: Free Intentional Spending & Gifting Template for Notion
name: Free Intentional Spending & Gifting Template for Notion
description: It's day 8 of my 12 Days of Giving! Making more purposeful purchases is important for us all, and this template is the perfect way to start!Track your wishlist and fill in details to help make more informed decisions regarding your purchases. Comes with an comprehensive way to categorise your wants & seeing the impact on your budgets. Whilst this has budgeting features, it's more about how you're spending - than what you're spending!Feature include:spending goals for 2024active wishlist &amp
features: spending goals for 2024; active wishlist & watching space; detailed digital wishlist and budget impact; wishlist categorises & year budgeting; pre-populated dates with calendar view for revisiting items after "cool off period"; gift gifting ideas (by idea, rather than recipient for more intentional gifting!); recipient database
